Articles.Content:
Hi, i'm noob.

That said, when I start a new game the MK16 parachutes reads :

- semi-depl effective diam 0

- fully depl effective diam 0

result : crash, death, destruction, etc.

my list of mods :

[![2JMFb7S.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/2JMFb7S.jpg)](http://imgur.com/2JMFb7S)

any idea ?
I would think by normal logic it wouldve been partwizard. Try unstalling partwizard and test it.

thanks, I found the answer in another thread ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Beale said this two or tree pages back:
> "Delete partdatabase.cfg in KSP main directory, forces game to calculate the parachute physics for this part again."
> 
> That works for me.
